trans-unit.source: Represents an <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"></xref> digital signature.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument"> </xref> firma digitale.

trans-unit.source: For more information about signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] packages, see Chapter 10 in the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulle definizioni della firma in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] pacchetti, vedere il capitolo 10 nella specifica XPS (XML Paper) disponibile per il download all'indirizzo [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package> digital signatures, see the MSDN article Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions available at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su <xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>firme digitali, vedere l'articolo MSDN Framework la firma digitale di Open Packaging Conventions disponibile all'indirizzo [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).</xref:System.IO.Packaging.Package>

trans-unit.source: For information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
trans-unit.target: Per informazioni su [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] vedere XML Paper Specification (XPS) per il download all'indirizzo [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>della firma.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: The Culture property is optional.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà è facoltativa.

trans-unit.source: The cultural information of the signature.
trans-unit.target: Le informazioni relative alla lingua della firma.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unwritten property changes exist for the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref> class and must be written to the package's stream.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se sono presenti modifiche non scritte della proprietà per il <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref> classe e deve essere scritto nel flusso del pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if uncommitted changes exist; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se sono presenti modifiche non salvate; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the string value of the signature intention agreement that the signer is signing against.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore di stringa dell'accordo preliminare di firma che sta eseguendo il firmatario rispetto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `Intent` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul `Intent` elemento definizioni della firma in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacchetti, vedere il capitolo 10 il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the intention agreement; for example, "I have read and agree."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>Che rappresenta l'accordo preliminare; ad esempio, "ho letto e accettato".</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity of the person who is requested to sign (or has signed) the package.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'identità della persona che è richiesto per firmare il pacchetto (o ha effettuato l'accesso).

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `SignerName` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà corrisponde al `SignerName` attributo del `SignatureDefinition` elemento in un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacchetto.

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference in the names.
trans-unit.target: Si noti la differenza nei nomi.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SignerName` attribute, see chapter 10 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul `SignerName` attributo, vedere il capitolo 10 il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the signer, for example, "Mary Jones, Marketing Dept."
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che rappresenta il firmatario, ad esempio, "Mary Jones, il reparto Marketing"</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the date and time by which the requested signer must sign the parts of the specified document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la data e ora mediante il quale il firmatario richiesto deve firmare le parti del documento specificato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SignBy` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul `SignBy` elemento definizioni della firma in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacchetti, vedere il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the deadline by which the signer must sign the package.
trans-unit.target: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.DateTime>che rappresenta la data di scadenza mediante il quale il firmatario deve firmare il pacchetto.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Nullable>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the legal jurisdiction where the package is signed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la giurisdizione in cui il pacchetto è firmato.

trans-unit.source: This property corresponds to the `SigningLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà corrisponde al `SigningLocation` elemento definizioni della firma in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacchetti.

trans-unit.source: Notice the difference in the names.
trans-unit.target: Si noti la differenza nei nomi.

trans-unit.source: The original producer of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package can set this property.
trans-unit.target: Il produttore originale del [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacchetto è possibile impostare questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the signer can set the property at the time of signing the package if no one else has already signed.
trans-unit.target: Facoltativamente, il firmatario può impostare la proprietà al momento della firma del pacchetto se nessun utente ha già eseguito l'accesso.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SigningLocation` element, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul `SigningLocation` elemento, vedere il capitolo 10 nel [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the jurisdiction, for example, "State of Utah, United States."
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>Che rappresenta la giurisdizione, ad esempio, "stato di Utah, Stati Uniti".</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a unique identifier for this <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un identificatore univoco per questo <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To link a `Signature` element to this <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>, you must set the `Id` attribute of the `Signature` to the value of the SpotId property.
trans-unit.target: Per collegare un `Signature` questo elemento <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>, è necessario impostare il `Id` attributo del `Signature` al valore della proprietà SpotId.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsSignatureDefinition>

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Signature` elements, see the [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) schema.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni su `Signature` elementi, vedere il [Open Packaging Conventions](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/xpspkg.mspx) dello schema.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SpotID` attribute of the `SignatureDefinition` element in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul `SpotID` attributo del `SignatureDefinition` elemento in un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] del pacchetto, vedere il capitolo 10 il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.Guid> that represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] of the signature definition.
trans-unit.target: A (<xref:System.Nullable>) <xref:System.Guid>che rappresenta il [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] della definizione della firma.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Nullable>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location that specifies where to display the visible digital signature in an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il percorso che specifica la posizione visualizzare la firma digitale visibile in un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] documento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the `SpotLocation` element of signature definitions in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] packages, see chapter 10 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul `SpotLocation` elemento definizioni della firma in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] pacchetti, vedere il capitolo 10 il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specifica, in cui è possibile ottenere in [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.SpotLocation"></xref> that represents the location in the package where a visible request for a signature appears.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.SpotLocation"> </xref> che rappresenta la posizione del pacchetto in cui viene visualizzata una richiesta per una firma visibile.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
